short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate note-taking for Google Meet, Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Slack. Supports 60 languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The smartest way to capture, summarize, and prepare for your day. Say goodbye to generic AI meeting notes. Get 10 hours back every week.

Unlock the future of autonomous productivity.🔮

With timeOS AI for Chrome, you can:

NEW! 🐰 Magic Notepad for Google Meet opens in your meeting, letting you capture key points instantly. Afterward, timeOS turns them into something legendary, tailored just for you.

⏳Get relevant context for upcoming meetings from your Gmail, previous meetings, and Calendar.
📝 Automate note-taking for Google Meet, Slack Huddles, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams
💾 Capture in-person meetings instantly using WhatsApp
🦸🏻‍♂️ Personalize your meeting notes using autonomous AI Templates
🤯 Attend meetings on your behalf and catch you up later
🪄 Automatically organize tasks in Notion, Asana, or ClickUp
📅 Get time-aware reminders so you never miss a meeting

BREAKDOWN

📝 Take ridiculously good meeting notes in any language on Google Meet, and do so without anyone noticing but you! 📝
No AI attendee joining the call, no pesky setup, etc… Join any Google Meet, click on “Summarize”, and you’re good to go. You can even “pause” to go off the record.

⏳ The fastest way to get ready for a meeting from any tab ⏳

Get briefed for upcoming meetings in seconds with context from previous meeting notes, LinkedIn, and even Gmail threads. No more last-minute preparations, let our AI proactively give you exactly what you need wherever you are in your browser.


🦸🏻‍♂️ Let our AI tailor your meeting notes using autonomous AI Templates. 🦸🏻‍♂️
Create your own, or use our library of ready-made templates from our community of 50,00 time developers. 


🪄 Stay effortlessly organized 🪄
Almost 2 hours/day wasted organizing information. timeOS intelligently organizes your meeting notes in one centralized, searchable hub in Notion, ClickUp, Asana, Slack and more.


🤯 Attend meetings on your behalf 🤯
Send your AI assistant ahead, complete with a personalized message that's shared with participants in the meeting chat.


📅 Get time-aware reminders so you never miss a meeting. 📅
Keep on top of your calendar by getting timely reminders to join meetings on time.
You can even send your AI bot to attend meetings on your behalf if you’re running late or not planning to attend at all, and still get meeting notes that automatically sync to your favorite work tools.


⚡Access your calendar and meeting notes on any website with ⌘+E. ⚡
Take a quick look at your calendar from any tab using our Time Peek feature, without switching contexts. Time Peek shows how long until your next meeting and the time remaining in your current one. Our Chrome extension can set your new default tab to access your meeting notes and everything else timeOS needs.


Experience the future of autonomous productivity. 🔮

https://www.timeos.ai
